content.rendered:
Access to exciting projects

Guillaume is in charge of his first major project, in which he oversees a large number of VINCI Construction managers: Arena 92, the new stadium/concert hall west of Paris. As an avid sports fan and the father of four children, he knows how to juggle personal objectives and professional challenges. He enjoys working in a wide-ranging job involving technical, managerial and budget objectives.

excerpt.rendered: Guillaume is in charge of his first major project, in which he oversees a large number of VINCI Construction managers
